text: I am writing to apply for the Web Developer Internship (Remote) position I came across on LinkedIn. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team while further developing my technical skills. I have a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with hands-on experience working with React for building interactive user interfaces. I am also comfortable with Git/GitHub workflow, responsive design, and integrating APIs into projects. My ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and solve problems effectively makes me confident in my ability to add value to your projects.
